mapper.select:
select b4.id, b1.gdbh, b1.gddl, b1.gdzl, b1.gddlx, b1.gdms, b3.fjzch, b3.bjh, b3.bjxlh, b1.jkbz, b1.dprtCode, b1.zt, b7.id rwid, b7.rwdh, b1.gdid, b3.jkxmbh_f, b3.jkflbh_f, b4.id, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = b7.whrid) rwwhr, to_char(b7.whsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') rwwhsj , (select t1.ms from d_00601 t1 where t1.jklbh = b3.jkxmbh_f and t1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh_f) ms_f, b3.jkz_f, (case b3.jkxmbh_f when 'calendar' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when 'fuselage_flight_time' then (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_fz END) when 'search_light_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_fz END) when 'winch_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_fz END) when 'landing_gear_cycle' then b6.qljxh || '' when 'winch_cycle' then b5.jcxh || '' when 'ext_suspension_loop' then b5.dgxh || '' when 'special_first' then b6.ts1 || '' when 'special_second' then b6.ts2 || '' when 'N1' then b5.fdj_n1 || '' when 'N2' then b5.fdj_n2 || '' when 'N3' then b5.fdj_n3 || '' when 'N4' then b5.fdj_n4 || '' when 'N5' then b5.fdj_n5 || '' when 'N6' then b5.fdj_n6 || '' else '0' end) sj_f,
b3.jkxmbh_s, b3.jkflbh_s, (select t1.ms from d_00601 t1 where t1.jklbh = b3.jkxmbh_s and t1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh_s) ms_s, b3.jkz_s, (case b3.jkxmbh_s when 'calendar' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when 'fuselage_flight_time' then (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_fz END) when 'search_light_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_fz END) when 'winch_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_fz END) when 'landing_gear_cycle' then b6.qljxh || '' when 'winch_cycle' then b5.jcxh || '' when 'ext_suspension_loop' then b5.dgxh || '' when 'special_first' then b6.ts1 || '' when 'special_second' then b6.ts2 || '' when 'N1' then b5.fdj_n1 || '' when 'N2' then b5.fdj_n2 || '' when 'N3' then b5.fdj_n3 || '' when 'N4' then b5.fdj_n4 || '' when 'N5' then b5.fdj_n5 || '' when 'N6' then b5.fdj_n6 || '' else '0' end) sj_s,
b3.jkxmbh_t, b3.jkflbh_t, (select t1.ms from d_00601 t1 where t1.jklbh = b3.jkxmbh_t and t1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh_t) ms_t, b3.jkz_t, (case b3.jkxmbh_t when 'calendar' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when 'fuselage_flight_time' then (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_fz END) when 'search_light_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_fz END) when 'winch_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_fz END) when 'landing_gear_cycle' then b6.qljxh || '' when 'winch_cycle' then b5.jcxh || '' when 'ext_suspension_loop' then b5.dgxh || '' when 'special_first' then b6.ts1 || '' when 'special_second' then b6.ts2 || '' when 'N1' then b5.fdj_n1 || '' when 'N2' then b5.fdj_n2 || '' when 'N3' then b5.fdj_n3 || '' when 'N4' then b5.fdj_n4 || '' when 'N5' then b5.fdj_n5 || '' when 'N6' then b5.fdj_n6 || '' else '0' end) sj_t, t6.dprtname from (select gdbh,id gdid, 'EO' gddl, 3 gdzl, 3 gddlx, xfgdyy gdms, gdjcid, dprtCode, zt, jkbz from b_g_010 t1 where t1.zt =3
union all select gdbh,id gdid, 'FLX' gddl, gdlx gdzl, 2 gddlx, xfgdyy gdms, gdjcid, dprtCode, zt, jkbz from b_g_007 t2 where t2.zt =3 and t2.gdlx in (2, 3) ) b1 join b_g_006 b2 on b1.gdjcid = b2.id join b_g_00604 b3 on b3.mainid = b2.id and b3.zt = 1
left join (select t1.id,t1.fjzch,t1.rwid,t1.gdid, t1.jh, t1.xlh, t1.dprtcode, case t1.cj when 2 then t2.jh when 1 then t1.jh else t1.jh end fjdjh, case t1.cj when 2 then t2.xlh when 1 then t1.xlh else t1.xlh end fjdxlh, t1.cj, t1.bjlx from b_s_003 t1 left join b_s_003 t2 on t2.id = t1.fjdid where t1.zt = 1 and t1.sxzt = 1 ) b4 on b3.fjzch = b4.fjzch and b3.bjh = b4.jh and b3.bjxlh = b4.xlh and b3.dprtcode = b4.dprtcode left join (select jh, xlh, dprtcode, sum(fxsj_xs) fxsj_xs, sum(fxsj_fz) fxsj_fz, sum(fsj_xs) fsj_xs, sum(fsj_fz) fsj_fz, sum(qljxh) qljxh, sum(jcsj_xs) jcsj_xs, sum(jcsj_fz) jcsj_fz, sum(jcxh) jcxh, sum(fdj_n1) fdj_n1, sum(fdj_n2) fdj_n2, sum(fdj_n3) fdj_n3, sum(fdj_n4) fdj_n4, sum(fdj_n5) fdj_n5, sum(fdj_n6) fdj_n6, sum(ssdsj_xs) ssdsj_xs, sum(ssdsj_fz) ssdsj_fz, sum(dgxh) dgxh, sum(ts1) ts1, sum(ts2) ts2 from b_h_01001 where is_cyjs = 1 and zt = 1 and xdbs = 0 group by jh, xlh, dprtcode) b5 on b4.fjdjh = b5.jh and b4.fjdxlh = b5.xlh and b4.dprtcode = b5.dprtcode left join (select b_s_006.fjzch, b_s_006.dprtcode, sum(b_s_00601.fxsj_xs) fxsj_xs, sum(b_s_00601.fxsj_fz) fxsj_fz, sum(b_s_00601.qljxh) qljxh, sum(b_s_00601.ts1) ts1, sum(b_s_00601.ts2) ts2 from b_s_00601 join b_s_006 on b_s_006.id = b_s_00601.fxjldid and b_s_00601.zt = 1 and b_s_00601.xdbs = 0
and b_s_006.zt in (2, 12, 99) group by b_s_006.fjzch, b_s_006.dprtcode) b6 on b6.fjzch = b3.fjzch and b6.dprtcode = b3.dprtcode left join b_s_009 b7 on b1.gdid = b7.xggdid and b7.zt in (1,2) left join t_department t6 on b2.dprtcode =t6.id
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

select b1.gdbh, b1.gddl, b1.gdzl, b1.gddlx, b1.gdms, b3.fjzch, b3.bjh, b3.bjxlh, b1.jkbz, b1.dprtCode, b1.zt, b4.id, b7.id rwid, b1.gdid, b3.jkxmbh_f, b3.jkflbh_f, (select t1.ms from d_00601 t1 where t1.jklbh = b3.jkxmbh_f and t1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh_f) ms_f, b3.jkz_f, (case b3.jkxmbh_f when 'calendar' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when 'fuselage_flight_time' then (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_fz END) when 'search_light_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_fz END) when 'winch_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_fz END) when 'landing_gear_cycle' then b6.qljxh || '' when 'winch_cycle' then b5.jcxh || '' when 'ext_suspension_loop' then b5.dgxh || '' when 'special_first' then b6.ts1 || '' when 'special_second' then b6.ts2 || '' when 'N1' then b5.fdj_n1 || '' when 'N2' then b5.fdj_n2 || '' when 'N3' then b5.fdj_n3 || '' when 'N4' then b5.fdj_n4 || '' when 'N5' then b5.fdj_n5 || '' when 'N6' then b5.fdj_n6 || '' else '0' end) sj_f,
b3.jkxmbh_s, b3.jkflbh_s, (select t1.ms from d_00601 t1 where t1.jklbh = b3.jkxmbh_s and t1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh_s) ms_s, b3.jkz_s, (case b3.jkxmbh_s when 'calendar' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when 'fuselage_flight_time' then (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_fz END) when 'search_light_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_fz END) when 'winch_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_fz END) when 'landing_gear_cycle' then b6.qljxh || '' when 'winch_cycle' then b5.jcxh || '' when 'ext_suspension_loop' then b5.dgxh || '' when 'special_first' then b6.ts1 || '' when 'special_second' then b6.ts2 || '' when 'N1' then b5.fdj_n1 || '' when 'N2' then b5.fdj_n2 || '' when 'N3' then b5.fdj_n3 || '' when 'N4' then b5.fdj_n4 || '' when 'N5' then b5.fdj_n5 || '' when 'N6' then b5.fdj_n6 || '' else '0' end) sj_s,
b3.jkxmbh_t, b3.jkflbh_t, (select t1.ms from d_00601 t1 where t1.jklbh = b3.jkxmbh_t and t1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh_t) ms_t, b3.jkz_t, (case b3.jkxmbh_t when 'calendar' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when 'fuselage_flight_time' then (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b6.fxsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b6.fxsj_fz END) when 'search_light_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.ssdsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.ssdsj_fz END) when 'winch_time' then (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b5.jcsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b5.jcsj_fz END) when 'landing_gear_cycle' then b6.qljxh || '' when 'winch_cycle' then b5.jcxh || '' when 'ext_suspension_loop' then b5.dgxh || '' when 'special_first' then b6.ts1 || '' when 'special_second' then b6.ts2 || '' when 'N1' then b5.fdj_n1 || '' when 'N2' then b5.fdj_n2 || '' when 'N3' then b5.fdj_n3 || '' when 'N4' then b5.fdj_n4 || '' when 'N5' then b5.fdj_n5 || '' when 'N6' then b5.fdj_n6 || '' else '0' end) sj_t from (select gdbh,id gdid, 'EO' gddl, 3 gdzl, 3 gddlx, xfgdyy gdms, gdjcid, dprtCode, zt, jkbz from b_g_010 t1 where t1.zt =3
union all select gdbh,id gdid, 'FLX' gddl, gdlx gdzl, 2 gddlx, xfgdyy gdms, gdjcid, dprtCode, zt, jkbz from b_g_007 t2 where t2.zt =3 and t2.gdlx in (2, 3) ) b1 join b_g_006 b2 on b1.gdjcid = b2.id join b_g_00604 b3 on b3.mainid = b2.id and b3.zt = 1
left join (select t1.id,t1.fjzch,t1.rwid,t1.gdid, t1.jh, t1.xlh, t1.dprtcode, case t1.cj when 2 then t2.jh when 1 then t1.jh else t1.jh end fjdjh, case t1.cj when 2 then t2.xlh when 1 then t1.xlh else t1.xlh end fjdxlh, t1.cj, t1.bjlx from b_s_003 t1 left join b_s_003 t2 on t2.id = t1.fjdid where t1.zt = 1 and t1.sxzt = 1 ) b4 on b3.fjzch = b4.fjzch and b3.bjh = b4.jh and b3.bjxlh = b4.xlh and b3.dprtcode = b4.dprtcode left join (select jh, xlh, dprtcode, sum(fxsj_xs) fxsj_xs, sum(fxsj_fz) fxsj_fz, sum(fsj_xs) fsj_xs, sum(fsj_fz) fsj_fz, sum(qljxh) qljxh, sum(jcsj_xs) jcsj_xs, sum(jcsj_fz) jcsj_fz, sum(jcxh) jcxh, sum(fdj_n1) fdj_n1, sum(fdj_n2) fdj_n2, sum(fdj_n3) fdj_n3, sum(fdj_n4) fdj_n4, sum(fdj_n5) fdj_n5, sum(fdj_n6) fdj_n6, sum(ssdsj_xs) ssdsj_xs, sum(ssdsj_fz) ssdsj_fz, sum(dgxh) dgxh, sum(ts1) ts1, sum(ts2) ts2 from b_h_01001 where is_cyjs = 1 and zt = 1 and xdbs = 0 group by jh, xlh, dprtcode) b5 on b4.fjdjh = b5.jh and b4.fjdxlh = b5.xlh and b4.dprtcode = b5.dprtcode left join (select b_s_006.fjzch,b_s_006.dprtcode, sum(b_s_00601.fxsj_xs) fxsj_xs, sum(b_s_00601.fxsj_fz) fxsj_fz, sum(b_s_00601.qljxh) qljxh, sum(b_s_00601.ts1) ts1, sum(b_s_00601.ts2) ts2 from b_s_00601 join b_s_006 on b_s_006.id = b_s_00601.fxjldid and b_s_00601.zt = 1 and b_s_00601.xdbs = 0
and b_s_006.zt in (2, 12, 99) group by b_s_006.fjzch, b_s_006.dprtcode) b6 on b6.fjzch = b3.fjzch and b6.dprtcode = b3.dprtcode left join b_s_009 b7 on b1.gdid = b7.xggdid and b7.zt in (1,2)
